rooms.description: Spacious living area with large windows for natural light and ventilation, designed to serve as the main gathering space. Vastu alignment ensures positive energy flow.
Adjacent dining area integrated with living room; features traditional Chettinad motifs on walls and ceiling beams, enhanced by cross ventilation.
Modern kitchen designed in a Chettinad style using natural materials. Ample windows for light; strategically placed near the living room to observe family activities.
Master bedroom on ground floor with south-facing window (Vastu beneficial for health and prosperity). Includes a walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom.
Secondary bedroom designed with ample light; features built-in storage and ventilation openings aligning with Vastu principles for restful sleep.
Additional bedroom following similar design guidelines to ensure consistency in natural lighting and energy flow.
Guest room with subtle Chettinad accents, designed for occasional use but maintaining privacy and good ventilation.
Main bathroom on ground floor serving master bedroom; includes fixtures that allow ease of access and natural light via frosted windows.

openings.description: Primary entrance ensuring auspicious entry as per Vastu principles, with a vestibule for transition from outside to interior spaces.
Multiple windows strategically placed across rooms to maximize natural light and cross ventilation.
Small balcony providing access to the rooftop terrace from the ground floor, ensuring a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor spaces.

rooms.description: Master bedroom on first floor designed with a large balcony overlooking the garden, ensuring privacy and abundant natural light. Vastu principles favoring northeast orientation for prosperity.
Additional bedroom focusing on quiet and relaxation; includes large windows to capture morning light while preserving the traditional Chettinad aesthetic.
Dedicated study area with ample natural lighting and ventilation. Minimalistic design inspired by Chettinad detailing.
Bathroom on first floor designed for comfort and privacy, with soundproofing and moisture-resistant materials, complemented by natural light access.

openings.description: Staircase connecting ground and first floor with ample space for movement; designed to be safe and comfortable, in line with building norms.

openings.location: adjacent to master bedroom on first floor
openings.description: Balcony providing direct access to the rooftop terrace, enhancing natural ventilation and views.
